data.text:
About[]

Big Fish Games Studios (shortened to Big Fish Studios) is the internal development studio that published original titles every year under Big Fish Games. They are most famous for game series like Mystery Case Files, Drawn (purely puzzle-based), Azada (again purely puzzle-based; since taken over by ERS Games), Life Quest (strategy-based), and Fairway Solitaire (solitaire-based).

Big Fish Games seems to have moved on from Big Fish Games Studios at least in terms of developing hidden object games as Big Fish Games has only primarily published other hidden object games since Mystery Case Files: Shadow Lake in 2012. Big Fish Games has developed other games that are not hidden object-based since (primarily free-to-play mobile games), just not under the title Big Fish Game Studios anymore.

Games List[]

(Please note that, as this is a Hidden Object game wiki, only the Hidden Object games will be listed.)

Mystery Case Files was given to Elephant Games, then Eipix Entertainment, and finally GrandMA Studios.

Hidden Expedition was given to Eipix Entertainment and then DominiGames.

Although not promoted as such, Mystery in London: On the Trail of Jack the Ripper is a Travelogue 360 game with the same exact gameplay style.
